title-group.article-title: A Finite Element Approximation for a Class of Degenerate Elliptic Equations

abstract.p: In this paper we exhibit a finite element method fitting a suitable geometry naturally associated with a class of degenerate elliptic equations (usually called Grushin type equations) in a plane region, and we discuss the related error estimates.
